summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Thirty-sixth Avenue, from East Sprig Street to East Terrace Street, and East Terrace Street, from Thirty-sixth Avenue to the east line of Leschi Heights Addition to the City of Seattle, all in the City of Seattle, by laying watermains therein of proper dimensions and material, together with all gates, tees, crosses, fire hydrants and other necessary appurtenances, to provide reasonable water service and fire protection of said district; in accordance with Resolution No. 1015 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
